newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to watch - May 6.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to watch - May 6.

text.p: * Philip Morris Cos Inc which climbed $3-7/8 or nearly 10 percent on Monday after a favorable U.S. court ruling, was down $1/4 to $43-3/4 in London while RJR Nabisco Holdings Corp eased $1/8 to $32-1/2 after a $3 jump overnight.
* Elsewhere, Intel Corp slipped $1/4 to $162-1/4 following a $4-7/8 advance on Monday while Digital Equipment Corp added $1/8 to $31-3/4.

* Genzyme Corp traded at 20 against a Nasdaq close of 22-5/16 after hours on Monday. Its stock resumed trading after a U.S. Food and Drug Administration panel voted against granting the company approval for a coating solution.

* Foundation Health Systems said it was engaged in discussions with Physicians Health Services regarding its possible acquisition of Physicians Health. Foundation closed at 27-3/4 while Physicians closed at 22-7/8.
